message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $75.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than $75. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $80.
